1.content:
Welcome to The Rugrats and the chocolate factory interactive.

My latest Story.

Hope you enjoy it!

Sending the Rugrats to a mysterious Candy Making factory.

First, Which of the 4 families in the Rugrats Universe is the golden ticket winner #1?
1.title: Who is the first winner of a golden Ticket?!

11.content: Who in The family of the Pickles shall be getting the golden ticket?
11.title: The Pickles Family

111.content:
Stu, Didi, Tommy, and Dil Pickles were going home from the zoo.
"You were such a good boy at the zoo," said Didi, "Here, you can have a candy bar."
She opened the wrapper and found a gold piece of paper marked Golden Ticket.
"Look at this, Stu!" said Didi.

She flipped the ticket over and Stu read the back of the ticket:

Congratulations! You just won a free tour of my chocolate factory! If you're lucky, you may just win a special prize beyond your wildest imagination. Arrive at the factory at ten o'clock A.M. on the 25th of May, with one parent or guardian. P.S. If you are an adult, please send this to a minor you know as this deal was made exclusively for children.

"Isn't this exciting?!" said Didi, "You're going to a chocolate factory! Only who will take Tommy?" she said, turning to Stu.
Who ends up taking Tommy to the factory?
111.title: Tommy Pickles

112.content:
One day, the Pickleses were grocery shopping.
Dil reached out of his stroller and grabbed a chocolate bar.
He began to take the wrapper off.
"No, son," said Didi, "We have to pay."

Then, she noticed the Golden Ticket.
"Wow," said Didi, "You're going to a chocolate factory next week!".

Who will take Dil to the factory?
112.title: Dil Pickles

113.content:
One day, the babies were playing in Tommy's playpen, when Drew and Charlotte entered, with Angelica.
Drew walked over to the playpen and handed the babies a bar of chocolate each.
They opened the wrappers, when Angelica noticed a gold piece of paper.

"Hey, that's not fair!" said Phil, "How come she gets a shiny piece of paper and we don't?!"
Drew read the paper.
"Isn't this exciting, Princess?!" said Drew, "It says you'll be going to a chocolate factory!"
Angelica beamed.

Who will take Angelica to the factory?
113.title: Angelica Pickles

114.content:
One day, Didi was opening up the wrapper for a candy bar, when she found a Golden Ticket.
She read that the offer was only for kids, but she couldn't resist a tour of a candy factory, so she decided to take one or both of her sons.
Who does she take?
114.title: Didi Pickles

115.content: Who else in the family of the pickles is the Lucky Ticket winner?
115.title: More Family members

choices: Angelica tells the babies that she and her mommy will go to a chocolate factory.
The finding of the second Golden Ticket.
1151.content:
"Guess what?!" said Charlotte.
"What?" said Drew.
"I found this in my candy bar," said Charlotte.
Drew read the Golden Ticket. "Congrats, honey," he said, "But it says it's only for kids."
"I'll take Angelica," said Charlotte.
Of course, Angelica was delighted to go, because she loved anything to do with candy.

What happens now?
1151.title: Charlotte Pickles

choices: Someone finds the second Golden Ticket.
1152.content:
"Guess what, Princess?" said Drew Pickles.
"You got me a pony?" asked Angelica.
"No," said Drew, "but it's just as exciting: Daddy won a tour of a chocolate factory! And it says I have to bring a child, so would you like to go?"
"Of course!" said Angelica.

What happens now?
1152.title: Drew Pickles

choices: More Once seen members of the Pickles Family in The Rugrats Series
1153.content: Anymore from The Rugrats Franchise of The Pickles Family you can think of?
1153.title: More

11531.content:
"Hey, Deed!" said Stu, "Look at this."
He handed her the Golden Ticket he won in his chocolate bar.
"That's excellent, Stu," said Didi, "But it says you have to bring a child. Who will you bring?"
Who does Stu bring?
11531.title: Stu Pickles

11532.content: Who will win the ticket?
11532.title: More Once seen members of the Pickles Family in...

choices: More Members of the Deville family
12.content: Who inside the Deville Family is the First Ticket winner?
12.title: The Deville Family

121.content:
"Well, would ya look at that?!" said Betty, reading her Golden Ticket.
"This is a once-in-a-lifetime experience, and it says I have to bring a pup."
Who does Betty bring?
121.title: Betty

122.content:
Howard DeVille looked at the Golden Ticket.
"It says I have to bring a kid," he says, "Do you think they'll be ready for a factory tour?"
"They were born ready!" said Betty, slapping his shoulder playfully.
Who goes with Howard to the factory?
122.title: Howard

123.content:
Phil and Lil were playing in their room, when Betty handed them a chocolate bar each.
"Hey, no fair, Philip," said Lil, "You gots a shiny piece of paper and I don't."
"That's because I'm more important than you, Lillian."
"No, you're not!" said Lil.
Betty then read the note.
"Isn't this exciting?" said Betty, "You're going to a candy factory!"
Who takes him?
123.title: Phil

124.content:
One day, the babies were playing in the playpen and they had candy.
Lil picked up a bar of chocolate and unwrapped it, then a piece of golden paper fell out.
"Wow!" said Tommy.
"No fair," said Phil.
Stu, who'd been watching them, read out the Golden Ticket.
Who will take Lil to the chocolate factory?
124.title: Lil

125.content: Who will get the Golden Ticket.
125.title: More Members of the Deville family

13.content:
You have selected the Finster Family.

Who shall be the Lucky Winner to the tour?
13.title: The Finster Family

choices: Old fashion in a chocolate bar
131.content: How does Kira acquire the ticket?
131.title: Kira

1311.content:
Kira opened up her chocolate bar.
"Wow," she said, "I get a factory tour? Now, who will I take?"
Who does Kira take?
1311.title: Old fashion in a chocolate bar

13112.content:
Kira decided to take her daughter, Kimi. She was the right one to go with her. Kira got her ready and they set off for the tour.

"Now Kimi, we'll be in a tour for a win of the factory. Be a good girl while there." Kira said.

Kimi nodded in agreement. She made her way there with Kimi for the tour. She wondered what it would be like for no ones been inside it for years. Time was running short before it begins and she hoped to get there on time.
13112.title: Kimi.

131121.content:
They finally arrived at the factory, and it was 9:59, just one minute early.
Are Kimi's friends there?
131121.title: The tour begins

1311212.content:
Looking around, there was no one there that she knew. Kira looked at her watch and it said 10:00 on the dot. They were suppose to start now so the owner was late.

"Here he comes. About time." Kira said.

A man wearing a red overcoat and black clothes under it. He made his way down to the gate, greeted them and let them in. He showed them inside and they hung their coats up in the first room. A couple jumped at how the hooks grabbed their things before continuing.
1311212.title: No.

choices: Someone falls into the chocolate river.
13112121.content:
Kira followed the man, pushing Kimi in her stroller.
Eventually, they ended up at the end of the hallway, and there was a tiny door.
"We could never fit through that!" said a voice in the crowd.
"It has to be this small to keep the flavor in," joked the man, before using his key and revealing that the "door" was actually painted on a normal door.

The room they entered appeared to be an indoor garden, except it had a river that was made of chocolate.
"Everything in this room is edible," said the man, "Technically, I am too, but that's cannibalism, which is generally considered a bad idea."
Kira giggled. "You can eat anything, but please don't drink from the chocolate river. Enjoy," said the man, as everybody went off to explore.

What happens now?
13112121.title: First room

choices: Kimi wants to try the river
131121212.content:
With everyone enjoying the room, someone was bound to slip up one way or another. That would be from trying to eat the owner of drinking from the river. Fortunately the latter is going to happen. An overweight German boy was drinking right from the river when he was told specifically not to when entering the room.

"Little boy, stop now." The man said.

He kept drinking away despite the pleading from his mother. The others watched and didn't do much to help. When he went for another hand full of chocolate, he leaned in too far. He fell in to the chocolate river and tried to get back out but ran into another problem. A pipe came down the ceiling and started sucking in the chocolate. He got sucked up the pipe and got stuck a couple times. The Oompa Loompas took his mother away to another room leaving 4 contestants left. Kira hoped to win it for Kimi and Chuckie.
131121212.title: Someone falls into the chocolate river.

1311212121.content:
When the woman was taken away to the room her son was at, the rest were loaded onto a boat. A light cruise followed by a fast pace, trippy rude down a pipe led them to the next room. They saw doors to different rooms for different things. One had a cow being whipped to make whipped cream. They stopped in front of the fire that says testing room.

"Here is where whee test all the new products before shipping them out." The man said.

They ask liked at the different things and machines there. He told them to not touch anything in this room. One of the machines he showed them was a gum making machine. This gum isn't any ordinary gum but a three course gum. The person try it was...
1311212121.title: Next room

choices: Take Kimi to the Juicing Room so that Kira can see her.
13112121211.content:
Kira began chewing the gum, but something weird happened.
First, her nose began to turn a dark purplish blue, then the rest of her face, her hands, legs, and finally, her hair.
Then, she began to expand and swell up.
"Sorry, ma'am," said the owner, "The blueberry pie part has this weird side-effect."
When Kira had stopped swelling, her entire midsection was the size of a large, round truck, but her legs were still normal-sized, so she could not stand up.
"We need to take her to the Juicing Room to squeeze out the juice," said the owner, "But we can't leave the toddler unattended."
What's the solution?
13112121211.title: Kira

13112121212.content:
Kimi grabbed the gum and started chewing.
She giggled at the different tastes, but then, she started turning blue.
"What's happening to my daughter?!" said Kira.
"You see," said the owner, "When it gets to the dessert, it makes people swell up and turn blue like blueberries."
"But I can't have a blueberry for a daughter!" said Kira.
"You could put her in a county fair," joked a girl in the crowd.
"Fair?! Fair?!" shouted Kira, getting a bit mad.
"Don't worry, she'll be fine," said the owner, "We just need to squeeze the juice out of her in the Juicing Room!"
By this stage, Kimi was being rolled away into the boat and she was the size of a car and mostly naked; her shirt, dress, and diaper had ripped off. She was also completely blue.

What happens now?
13112121212.title: Kimi

13112121213.content:
A blonde-haired girl then grabbed the piece of gum.
"It's amazing!" said the girl, "It tastes exactly like the food, but it also feels weird, like I'm swallowing it."
Then, her nose started to turn blue.
Kimi giggled, but Kira looked shocked.
They overheard the owner apologize to the girl's mother and note that it was a side-effect of the blueberry pie.
When she'd finished, she was blue from head to toe and had swollen up like a big, round blueberry.
They rolled her into the boat.
What happens now?
13112121213.title: A blonde haired girl

choices: Got interrupted by Kira or the owner.
1311212122.content:
Kimi had been asleep in her stroller when the owner told them not to drink from the river, so she wanted to try the river.
She toddled over to the river and...
1311212122.title: Kimi wants to try the river

choices: "I heard that the waterfall mixes the chocolate. Is that true?"
"Is it true that your ice cream doesn't melt?"
1311212123.content: What is Kira curious about?
1311212123.title: Kira is curious about something

choices: How many different candies are there?
13112122.title: Someone asks a question

13112123.content: What is Kira curious about?
13112123.title: Kira is curious about something

choices: To fake having a Golden Ticket.
131122.title: Angelica hatches a plan

choices: She forgot to pack extra diapers.
She forgot to tell Chas where they were going.
131123.title: Kira remembers something

1312.content:
The Finsters were walking down the street, when Kira saw a Golden Ticket blowing in the breeze.
She reached up and caught it.
Then, she decided to see if it had an owner, but no one claimed it, so she decided to keep it and take...
1312.title: In the street

1313.content: Where does Kira Finster find the ticket?
1313.title: Something else

132.content:
One day, Chas was opening his candy bar, when he found a Golden Ticket.
He read it out.
"Well, it can't hurt to give them the experience," he said to himself.
Which kid does he take?
132.title: Chas

133.content:
"You were really good letting me take that splinter out," said Chas to his son, "So here's a candy bar."
He then noticed that there was a Golden Ticket in the wrapper.
"Hey, you're going to a chocolate factory!" said Chas.
Who will take Chuckie?
133.title: Chuckie

134.content:
As a treat, Chas was giving his kids something from the vending machine.
Kimi's candy bar had a Golden Ticket inside.
"Hey, isn't that wonderful? Your first factory tour," said Chas.
Who will take Kimi to the factory?
134.title: Kimi

135.content: Who wins the Golden Ticket?
135.title: More Family members

choices: Buster or more members of the family
14.content:
You have selected the Carmichael Family.

Who is the lucky one in the family?
14.title: The Carmichael Family

141.content:
Lucy was reading the Golden Ticket she'd won in her chocolate bar.
"Cool," she said, "And it says I have to bring a kid... well, I have plenty of those!".
How many of her kids does Lucy bring?
141.title: Lucy

142.content:
One day, Randy was reading the Golden Ticket.
"That's wonderful, honey," said Lucy, "And tell me all about it when you get back."
He decided to take how many kids?
142.title: Randy

143.content:
One day, Randy handed everyone in the household a chocolate bar.
When Susie opened hers, there was a Golden Ticket inside.
While her siblings were a bit jealous, they were very happy for their little sister and wanted to hear all about the trip when she got back.
"Who's taking me?" asked Susie.
Who is taking Susie?
143.title: Susie

144.content:
Edwin was at his desk, reading, when he reached into his candy bowl and pulled out a chocolate bar.
He read the description, then came bursting into the living room.
"Mommy! Daddy! Look what I won!"
Lucy read it, then said, "Wow!".
Who will take Edwin to the factory?
144.title: Edwin

145.content: Who will win the ticket?
145.title: Buster or more members of the family

info.brief_description: Join The Rugrats in this Mysterious Adventure in the strangest candy factory!
info.description:
Here are The rules that must be obeyed in order to keep this story alive.

1. You must keep it appropriate like the cartoons and movies.
2. The incidents that happens in the factory tour (Boy fallen into chocolate river) has to happen to either the Rugrats or their Grownups
3. Do not push your luck that lead to bad things.
4. Push Your Imagination in this interactive.
5. Ripped clothes for the blueberry inflation or any fruit inflation is allowed.
6. Have your excellent writing skills to the best!
7. Have Fun!
info.pretty_title: The Rugrats and the Chocolate Factory
